name: AWS Artifact.
short: A secure website for customers to access, manage, and download AWS compliance reports.
description: AWS Artifact is a cloud-based platform for managing and auditing compliance with AWS's security and governance standards. It provides access to AWS's security and compliance documents, including AWS's Service Organization Control (SOC) reports, PCI DSS reports, and ISO certification documents. It also allows users to upload their own documents and keep them in one secure location. AWS Artifact is an invaluable tool for keeping track of compliance and ensuring the security of data on AWS.
